structure.unit: Sec. 12-3009. - ADEQUATE FEED, WATER AND SHELTER.

text.section: All dogs and cats shall be given adequate feed, adequate water and adequate shelter. Adequate shelter is defined as an enclosure of at least three (3) sides, a roof and a floor. The enclosure shall be ventilated and must have sufficient room for the animal(s) to move around freely and to lie down comfortably.

section.section: Underneath outside steps, decks and stoops; or
Inside metal or plastic barrels or cardboard boxes; or
Rooms, sheds or other buildings without windows or proper ventilation. (Ord. No. 2003-411, ยง1, 3-18-03)
